form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Visa Applicants, NARA-157

full_text: creened by NARA, 7/20/202 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS Tijuana B, Calif DATE OF EXAMINATION February 22, 1979 At the request of the American Consul at CITY TIjuana B. Calif. COUNTRY Mexico I certify that on the above date I examined NAME AGE Tranquilina Espinoza de Higuera SEX 64 F I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: Mex. P. 566 DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Granuloma inguinale Syphilis, infectious stage Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation (mental deficiency) Previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity Mental defect Insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation CLASS B: (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) Physical Physical Defect, Well-Being. Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal CLASS C: M8ch41-25 RE77 Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, diagnosis, disease, and or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, - B, or C- pertinent details*): Class B: obesity 246 lbs 64" Class B: hypertension, mild, 160/100 sitting Class C: ametropia, corrected 14" X 17th Date 2-22-79 # 3240 Chest X-ray report normal chest film from Dr. Richard Potts, M.S Blood serological report non-reactive VDRL 2-16-79 Public Health, Tecate from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) no glycosuria from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE Richard Potty, M.B. DATE OF FINAL REPORT Panel Physician 50157-101 * Continue on reverse side if necessary. 2-22-79 * GPO 1975 580-458 (79-1) OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Formerly FS-398) January 1975 DEPT. OF STATE
